description: Gym, work, adventure, repeat. The Men's Greenpoint Featherless Jacket can weather it all, whatever the weather. Waterproof, breathable 2-layer GORE-TEX® fabric keeps you dry if it starts to drizzle, while 3M™ Thinsulate™ Featherless insulation is as warm as 700-fill-power down when the temps drop. Need extra protection from Mother Nature’s elements? The PFC-free DWR (Durable Water-Repellent) finish repels water, 100% seam taping prevents leaks, the fixed hood features a single-pull adjustment, and the interior cuffs block drafts. Stow commuting essentials in this winter coat's zippered handwarmer pockets.
name: Marmot Greenpoint Featherless Jacket - Mens
